name: PROB_CP_TEMPLATE
description: The PROB_CP_TEMPLATE table displays information about careplan templates associated with the given problem record.

columns.name: PROBLEM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the problem record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CAREPLAN_TEM_ID
columns.description: This column displays the care plan template ID.

columns.name: CAREPLAN_TEMP_DAT
columns.description: This column displays the care plan template contact date (DAT).
